description: '''Reda Tamni''' ({{langx|ar|رضى تمني}}; born 1980 in [[El Biar]], [[Algiers]]), known by his stage name '''Reda Taliani''' ({{langx|ar| رضى الطلياني|link=no}}), is an [[Algeria|Algerian]] [[raï]] singer and musician. He is a longtime resident from [[Aubagne]], [[Provence]], France. His music blends [[Chaabi (Algeria)|chaabi]], raï and traditional musical styles of the [[Maghreb]], and many of his songs depict the realities and aspirations of the Algerian youth.
